table_description: Group members in the Google Workspace domain.

columns.name: email
columns.description: The email address of the group member.

columns.name: role
columns.description: The role of the user within the group, such as 'OWNER', 'MEMBER', or 'MANAGER'.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of member (can be 'USER' or 'SERVICE_ACCOUNT').

columns.name: status
columns.description: The membership status of the user in the group, such as 'ACTIVE' or 'INVITED'.

columns.name: delivery_settings
columns.description: The email delivery setting for the member. It can be 'ALL_EMAILS', 'NOTIFICATIONS_ONLY', or 'NONE'.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique ID of the group member.
